00037 class KVILIB_API KviDnsResolverResult : public KviHeapObject
00038 {
00039         friend class KviDnsResolver;
00040         friend class KviDnsResolverThread;
00041 protected:
00042         KviDnsResolverResult();
00043 public:
00044         ~KviDnsResolverResult();
00045 protected:
00046         KviError::Code m_eError;
00047         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pHostnameList;
00048         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pIpAddressList;
00049         QString m_szQuery;
00050 public:
00051         KviError::Code error()
00052         {
00053                 return m_eError;
00054         }
00055 
00056         // never store nor delete these pointers!
00057         // (these are NEVER 0)
00058         KviPointerList<QString> * hostnameList()
00059         {
00060                 return m_pHostnameList;
00061         }
00062         
00063         KviPointerList<QString> * ipAddressList()
00064         {
00065                 return m_pIpAddressList;
00066         }
00067 
00068         const QString &query()
00069         {
00070                 return m_szQuery;
00071         }
00072 
00073 protected:
00074         void setError(KviError::Code eError)
00075         {
00076                 m_eError = eError;
00077         }
00078 
00079         void setQuery(const QString & szQuery)
00080         {
00081                 m_szQuery = szQuery;
00082         }
00083 
00084         void appendHostname(const QString & szHost);
00085         void appendAddress(const QString & szAddr);
00086 };

00089 #include <QObject>
00090 
00091 
00092 class KVILIB_API KviDnsResolver : public QObject, public KviHeapObject
00093 {
00094         Q_OBJECT
00095         Q_PROPERTY(bool blockingDelete READ isRunning)
00096 public:
00097         KviDnsResolver();
00098         virtual ~KviDnsResolver();
00099 public:
00100         enum QueryType { IPv4, IPv6, Any };
00101         enum State     { Idle, Busy, Failure, Success };
00102 protected:
00103         void * m_pAuxData;
00104         KviDnsResolverThread * m_pSlaveThread;
00105         KviDnsResolverResult * m_pDnsResult;
00106         State m_state;
00107 public:
00109         //
00110         // Public interface
00111         //
00112 
00113         // Lookup start
00114         bool lookup(const QString & szQuery, QueryType type);
00115 
00116         // Current object state
00117         State state(){ return m_state; };
00118 
00119         // Results (return always non null-data..but valid results only if state() == Success or Failure)
00120         KviError::Code error();
00121         QString errorString();
00122         const QString & firstHostname();
00123         const QString & hostName()
00124         {
00125                 return firstHostname();
00126         }
00127         const QString & firstIpAddress();
00128         int hostnameCount();
00129         int ipAddressCount();
00130         KviPointerList<QString> * hostnameList();
00131         KviPointerList<QString> * ipAddressList();
00132         const QString & query();
00133         bool isRunning() const;
00134 
00135         // Auxiliary data store
00136         void setAuxData(void * pAuxData){ m_pAuxData = pAuxData; };
00137         void * releaseAuxData(){ void * pData = m_pAuxData; m_pAuxData = 0; return pData; };
00138 protected:
00139         virtual bool event(QEvent *e);
00140 private:
00141         KviDnsResolverResult * result();
00142 signals:
00143         void lookupDone(KviDnsResolver *);
00144 };

00157 class KviDnsResolverThreadEvent : public QEvent
00158 {
00159 private:
00160         KviDnsResolverResult * m_pResult;
00161 public:
00162         KviDnsResolverThreadEvent(KviDnsResolverResult * pResult)
00163                 : QEvent(QEvent::User), m_pResult(pResult)
00164         {
00165                 KVI_ASSERT(pResult);
00166         }
00167         
00168         virtual ~KviDnsResolverThreadEvent()
00169         {
00170                 if(m_pResult)
00171                         delete m_pResult;
00172         }
00173 public:
00174         KviDnsResolverResult * releaseResult()
00175         {
00176                 KviDnsResolverResult * pResult = m_pResult;
00177                 m_pResult = NULL;
00178                 return pResult;
00179         }
00180 };

00182 class KviDnsResolverThread : public QThread
00183 {
00184         friend class KviDnsResolver;
00185 protected:
00186         KviDnsResolverThread(KviDnsResolver * pDns);
00187         virtual ~KviDnsResolverThread();
00188 protected:
00189         QString                      m_szQuery;
00190         KviDnsResolver::QueryType    m_queryType;
00191         KviDnsResolver             * m_pParentDns;
00192 public:
00193         void setQuery(const QString & szQuery, KviDnsResolver::QueryType type){ m_szQuery = szQuery; m_queryType = type; };
00194 protected:
00195         virtual void run();
00196         KviError::Code translateDnsError(int iErr);
00197         void postDnsError(KviDnsResolverResult * pDns, KviError::Code error);
00198 };
